ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hi all I have a question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm.. anything for chanters or wizzies in neriak? I may play on a different server to test out the faction stuff. :-) luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm.. anything for chanters or wizzies in neriak?
I may play on a different server to test out the faction stuff. :-)
luv,
-Su


> --- In EverQuest@y..., "subxero2002" <subxero2002@y...> wrote:
> > I used to hunt in EC but once I got higher lvls I have left EC for
> a
> > couple of months ...well I made a new character and I was hunting
> in
> > EC and there is alot of new stuff and new drops especially NO DROP
> > items and I cant find anything on these new items I have tried
> > casters realm and everlore but they dont have anything on these if
> > someone could E-mail me a web site to find out where to turn in
> these
> > new NO DROP items please let me know subxero2003@M...
>
> Allakhazam has been getting the requirements for all the newbie armor
> quests in all the time. It's not only Freeport but Neriak too. My
> Necro Alt has an almost full set of Unholy Silk armor. There is
> usually someone new in the Guild to ask about these.
>
> It's a good deal for newbies, or lowbies in our case. They are all
> similar to the stuff introduced in SoL for beastmasters, with some
> minor stat improvements, mana, hp's, etc.
>
> Tuldayen Grimblade
> 36th Season Ranger of Tunare
> Terris-Thule
>
>
